Title: Raw Behavioral Data from Rat Memory Task Experiments
Creator: Deep Brain Lab, Sound and Multimedia Department, Politechnika Gdańsk
Subject: To analyze and track behavioral performance under various memory tasks and protocols, focusing on learning and retrieval mechanisms.
Description: This dataset contains raw behavioral data from experiments designed to track performance in memory tasks. Each file documents session details, events, timestamps, and task-specific configurations.
Publisher: Deep Brain Lab, Sound and Multimedia Department, Politechnika Gdańsk
Contributor: Lab contact email or institutional URL
